name: Summoner'sSurvival
description:
A survival shooter that gathers fellow to fight.Player simply performs the move key.Then the fellow will kick your enemies to the curb.
Unlock achievements and add more fellow!The more your corps grows in number, the stronger it becomes.
Surround it with lots of fellow and bullets!...or perhaps it is vital to run away from time to time.
Repeat stages, collect coins, pay coins to strengthen player, and add more follow. Then, clear the stage!
